title: glsl
description: The `glsl` object simplifies the creation of OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL) programs by wrapping various GLSL compilers and the linker into a single, easy-to-use interface. It automatically loads shader files (e.g., `.vert`, `.frag`) based on a provided basename, allowing users to compile and link custom shaders for real-time graphics rendering. It also provides an inlet to set uniform variables within the compiled shader program.
